repos.name: wallykroeker.com
repos.description: Personal website and technical blog built with Next.js 14. Git-first publishing system where commits become blog posts.
currentGoals: Publishing Loop automation (WSL + N8N daily rollup)
Project timeline and build log system

repos.name: TaskMan
repos.description: ADHD-friendly task management system. Fork of Vikunja with N8N workflow automations for AI-powered task breakdown.

repos.name: Bob
repos.description: Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI) - Open-source AI orchestration system built on Claude Code. WSL2-based fork with skills system, hooks, and context management for augmenting daily workflows.

repos.name: GoodFields
repos.description: GoodFields - Professional security consulting and technology services company website. Built with Next.js 14 and deployed to production Proxmox container.
currentGoals: Production deployment and Cloudflare tunnel setup

repos.name: Prismis
repos.description: AI-powered research department - monitors RSS feeds, Reddit, and YouTube with semantic search and intelligent priority ranking. Built with Go daemon, Bubbletea TUI, and Python ML components.

repos.name: FabLab
repos.description: Personal infrastructure and network documentation. Enterprise-grade Proxmox infrastructure with comprehensive documentation, hardware/software inventory, network topology, and operational runbooks.

repos.name: Firefly III
repos.description: Personal finance management system deployed on Proxmox. Multi-entity financial tracking for Personal/GoodFields/FabLab with integration into Bob's financial-system skill for automated budget analysis and runway forecasting.
currentGoals: Phase 2: Bank import automation via Data Importer

repos.name: Bob and Friends
repos.description: Multi-agent orchestration system inspired by Bobiverse. Bob (original) coordinates five specialized clone agents (Bill, Mario, Riker, Howard, Homer) for parallel task execution. Built on Claude Agent SDK with ATXP Cloud deployment.
currentGoals: Define detailed agent personas and capabilities
Deploy Riker (Researcher) to ATXP Cloud as first clone
Demonstrate multi-agent architecture for GoodFields consulting
